Name: Sweep
Description: Swings a two handed melee weapon in a circle, knocking back monsters around the character.

Name: Ground Slam
Description: Slams the ground in front of you, creating a wave that travels forward and damages enemies with an increased chance to stun. The wave deals more damage to closer enemies. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

Name: Vaal Ground Slam
Description: Slams the ground in front of you, creating a wave that travels in all directions that damages enemies with an increased chance to stun. The wave deals more damage to closer enemies. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

Name: Ground Slam of Earthshaking
Description: Slams the ground in front of you, creating a wide wave that travels forward and damages enemies with an increased chance to stun. Requires a Two Handed Axe, Two Handed Mace, or Staff.

Name: Cleave
Description: The character swings their weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging monsters in an area in front of them. Only works with Axes and Swords.

Name: Cleave of Rage
Description: The character swings both their weapons in an arc, damaging monsters in an area in front of them. Requires dual wielding both an Axe and a Sword.

Name: Shield Charge
Description: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies.

Name: Enduring Cry
Description: Performs a warcry, taunting all nearby enemies to attack the user and granting a buff to the user and nearby allies. The user and allied players also gain endurance charges.

Name: Leap Slam
Description: Jump into the air, damaging enemies (and knocking back some) with your weapon where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an axe, mace, sword or staff.

Name: Leap Slam of Groundbreaking
Description: Jump a short distance through the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with your weapon where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Sword or Staff.

Name: Double Strike
Description: Performs two fast strikes with a melee weapon.

Name: Double Strike of Impaling
Description: Performs two fast strikes with a melee weapon.

Name: Double Strike of Momentum
Description: Performs two fast strikes with a melee weapon, gaining stages which cause this skill to attack faster. All stages are lost when you move.

Name: Vaal Double Strike
Description: Performs two fast strikes with a melee weapon, and summons your double for a duration to continuously attack monsters in this fashion.

Name: Elemental Hit
Description: Each attack with this skill will choose an element at random, and will only be able to deal damage of that element. If the attack hits an enemy, it will deal damage in an area around them, with the radius being larger if that enemy is suffering from an ailment of the chosen element. It will avoid choosing the same element twice in a row.

Name: Elemental Hit of the Spectrum
Description: Fires a projectile with a wand or bow that deals fire, cold and lightning damage. If the projectile hits an enemy, it will deal damage in an area around them.

Name: Immortal Call
Description: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.

Name: Vaal Immortal Call
Description: Discharges Endurance Charges, making the character unable to die or gain Vaal souls for a short time, proportional to how many endurance charges were expended.

Name: Dual Strike
Description: Attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one strike. Dual wield only. Does not work with wands.

Name: Dual Strike of Ambidexterity
Description: Attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one strike. Requires dual-wielding two different melee weapon types to use.

Name: Whirling Blades
Description: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. If dual wielding attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one hit. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.

Name: Frenzy
Description: Performs an attack that gives the character a frenzy charge if it hits. Frenzy charges increase your attack speed.

Name: Frenzy of Onslaught
Description: Perform a strike with a melee weapon that gives the character a frenzy charge if it hits. Frenzy charges increase your attack speed.

Name: Caustic Arrow
Description: Fires an arrow which deals chaos damage in an area on impact, and spreads caustic ground. Enemies standing on the caustic ground take chaos damage over time.

Name: Caustic Arrow of Poison
Description: Fires a poisonous arrow which deals chaos damage in an area on impact.

Name: Vaal Caustic Arrow
Description: Fires a slow-moving serpentine arrow which deals chaos damage while piercing enemies, and leaves a trail of caustic ground. Enemies standing on the caustic ground take chaos damage over time.

Name: Detonate Dead
Description: Targets a corpse, and deals spell damage to enemies around the corpse, as well as causing the corpse to explode, dealing fire damage. The explosion is not affected by modifiers to spell damage and cannot be reflected.

Name: Detonate Dead of Scavenging
Description: Targets a corpse, causing it to explode, dealing fire damage. The explosion is not affected by modifiers to spell damage and cannot be reflected. Cannot target corpses that have been created by skills.

Name: Detonate Dead of Chain Reaction
Description: Targets a corpse, and deals spell damage to enemies around the corpse, as well as causing the corpse to explode, dealing fire damage. The explosion is not affected by modifiers to spell damage and cannot be reflected. This will continue to target other corpses in the area, with a shorter delay between each one, until it runs out of corpses or has destroyed 8 corpses. Cannot be supported by Spell Cascade.

Name: Vaal Detonate Dead
Description: Explodes an unused corpse, dealing fire damage to nearby enemies. Nearby corpses will also explode in a chain reaction. The explosions are not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

Name: Flicker Strike
Description: Teleports the character to a nearby monster and attacks with a melee weapon. If no specific monster is targeted, one is picked at random. Grants a buff that increases movement speed for a duration. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Frenzy Charge.

Name: Flicker Strike of Power
Description: Teleports the character to a nearby monster and attacks with a melee weapon. If no specific monster is targeted, one is picked at random. Grants a buff that increases movement speed for a duration. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Power Charge.

Name: Vaal Flicker Strike
Description: Repeatedly teleports to enemies and hits them, inflicting a wound but dealing no damage. After the repeating finishes, each enemy is hit by the total damage of their wounds, which are removed.

Name: Blood Rage
Description: Adds a buff that deals Physical Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and can grant a Frenzy Charge.

Name: Split Arrow
Description: Fires multiple arrows at different targets.

Name: Split Arrow of Splitting
Description: Fires an arrow that splits to hit different targets.

Name: Vaal Split Arrow
Description: [DNT] Fires multiple arrows which continuously fork as they fly.

Name: Cold Snap
Description: Creates a sudden burst of cold in a targeted area, damaging enemies. Also creates an expanding area which is filled with chilled ground, and deals cold damage over time to enemies. Enemies that die while in the area have a chance to grant Frenzy Charges. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Frenzy Charge.

Name: Vaal Cold Snap
Description: Creates a sudden burst of cold around you, damaging enemies. This also creates a chilling area around you which expands and deals cold damage over time to surrounding enemies in addition to chilling them. Enemies that die while in the area grant Frenzy Charges, and you will passively gain Frenzy Charges while there are enemies in the area.

Name: Cold Snap of Power
Description: Creates a sudden burst of cold in a targeted area, damaging enemies. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Power Charge.

Name: Ice Nova
Description: A circle of ice expands from the caster.

Name: Ice Nova of Frostbolts
Description: A circle of ice expands from the caster. If the caster targets near their Frostbolt projectiles, it will expand from a number of those projectiles instead. If this skill would repeat when cast this way, it will instead expand again from the same projectiles after a short delay.

Name: Ice Nova of Deep Freeze
Description: A circle of ice expands from the caster.

Name: Vaal Ice Nova
Description: A chilling circle of ice expands from the caster, repeating from every enemy it hits.

Name: Fireball
Description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.

Name: Vaal Fireball
Description: Launches a series of fireballs in a spiral around the caster.

Name: Arc
Description: An arc of lightning reaches from the caster to a targeted enemy and chains to other enemies, but not immediately back. Each time the arc chains, it will also chain a secondary arc to another enemy that the main arc has not already hit, which cannot chain further.

Name: Arc of Surging
Description: An arc of lightning reaches from the caster to a targeted enemy and splits to simultaneously hit several other enemies.

Name: Arc of Oscillating
Description: An arc of lightning reaches from the caster to a targeted enemy and chains to other enemies. Each time the arc chains, it will also chain a secondary arc to another enemy, but this secondary arc cannot chain further.

Name: Vaal Arc
Description: A shocking arc of lightning reaches from the caster to a targeted enemy and chains to other enemies. Each time the arc chains from an enemy, it will do so simultaneously to two further enemies, but never to enemies that have already been hit by any of these chains. Also grants a buff making your Arc damage lucky for a short duration.

Name: Raise Zombie
Description: Raises a zombie minion from a corpse, which will follow you and attack enemies with a melee strike.

Name: Raise Zombie of Slamming
Description: Raises a zombie minion from a corpse, which will follow you and attack enemies with a melee strike and an area of effect slam which cannot be evaded.

Name: Raise Zombie of Falling
Description: Raises necromantic energies into the sky above a targeted location, where they coalesce into a zombie minion. The minion then attacks by falling to the ground, causing an impact that deals damage in an area and kills the zombie.

Name: Righteous Fire
Description: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.

Name: Righteous Fire of Arcane Devotion
Description: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.

Name: Vaal Righteous Fire
Description: A fiery blast removes your energy shield and all but 1 life, exploding outwards to deal fire damage to nearby enemies based on the life and energy shield lost.

Name: Discharge
Description: Discharge all the character's charges to deal elemental damage to all nearby monsters.

Name: Discharge of Misery
Description: Discharge all the character's charges to deal elemental damage to all nearby monsters.

Name: Portal
Description: Creates a portal to the current area's town.

Name: Vaal Breach
Description: Creates a breach, making you vulnerable to its powerful inhabitants.

Name: Default Attack
Description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.

Name: Cobra Lash
Description: Fires a poisonous projectile based on your weapon that will chain between enemies. Requires a Dagger or Claw.

Name: Spark
Description: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.

Name: Spark of the Nova
Description: Launches unpredictable sparks in all directions that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.

Name: Spark of Unpredictability
Description: Launches unpredictable sparks with that move randomly with large differences in speed and distance until they hit an enemy or expire.

Name: Vaal Spark
Description: Continuously launches unpredictable sparks in all directions that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.

Name: Ice Spear
Description: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.

Name: Ice Spear of Splitting
Description: Launches a shard of ice that splits on hitting terrain or enemies. After splitting, the projectiles are in second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.

Name: Raise Spectre
Description: Raises a spectral version of a defeated foe as a minion to fight for you in battle.

Name: Raise Spectre of Transience
Description: Raises a spectral version of a defeated foe as a temporary minion to fight for you in battle for a duration.

Name: Infernal Blow
Description: Attacks with your weapon, applying a charged debuff to enemies hit by your strike, and an uncharged debuff to any other enemies hit. Upon reaching 6 charges, expiring, or the enemy's death, the charged debuff is removed to damage that and other surrounding enemies. Enemies with either debuff explode when they die, damaging other surrounding enemies. Damage from this explosion cannot be reflected. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

Name: Infernal Blow of Immolation
Description: Attacks with your weapon, applying a charged debuff to you the first time you hit an enemy with this skill. Upon reaching 6 charges, or charges expiring, the charged debuff is removed to damage nearby enemies. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

Name: Glacial Hammer
Description: Hits enemies, converting some of your physical damage to cold damage. If a non-unique enemy is frozen and is on less than one third life, they will shatter when hit by Glacial Hammer. If striking three times in a row, the third strike will freeze enemies more easily. Requires a Mace, Sceptre or Staff.

Name: Glacial Hammer of Shattering
Description: Hits enemies, converting some of your physical damage to cold damage. If striking three times in a row, the third strike will be a critical strike. Requires a Mace, Sceptre or Staff.

Name: Vaal Glacial Hammer
Description: Hits enemies, converting some of your physical damage to cold damage. It traps enemies with you in a circle of ice so that they can't escape. Requires a Mace, Sceptre or Staff.

Name: Frost Wall
Description: Creates a wall of ice which holds back enemies. Targets under the wall are damaged and pushed back.

Name: Freezing Pulse
Description: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it dissipates.

Name: Shock Nova
Description: Casts a ring of Lightning around you, followed by a larger Lightning nova. Each effect hits enemies caught in their area with Lightning Damage.

Name: Viper Strike
Description: Hits enemies, converting some of your physical damage to chaos damage and inflicting poison which will be affected by modifiers to skill duration. If dual wielding, will strike with both weapons. Requires a claw, dagger or sword.

Name: Viper Strike of the Mamba
Description: Hits enemies, converting some of your physical damage to chaos damage and inflicting poison which will be affected by modifiers to skill duration. If dual wielding, deals the damage of both weapons in one strike. Requires a claw, dagger or sword.

Name: Phase Run
Description: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.

Name: Explosive Arrow
Description: Fires an arrow which will stick into an enemy or wall, and then explode, dealing area damage around it, either after a duration or when the maximum number of arrows stuck to that target is reached. If an enemy has multiple Explosive Arrows stuck in them, the first one to explode will consume the others, adding their damage to its explosion.

Name: Temporal Chains
Description: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.

Name: Elemental Weakness
Description: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.

Name: Warlord's Mark
Description: Curses a single enemy, giving a chance to double the duration of stuns on them. Attacking the cursed enemy will leech life and mana, stunning them will grant rage, and killing it will grant an endurance charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.

Name: Enfeeble
Description: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.

Name: Assassin's Mark
Description: Curses a single enemy, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and a power charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.

Name: Sniper's Mark
Description: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.

Name: Vulnerability
Description: Curse all targets in an area, causing them to take increased physical damage. Attacks against the cursed enemies have a chance to inflict bleeding.

Name: Lightning Warp
Description: Waits for a duration before teleporting to a targeted destination, with the duration based on the distance and your movement speed. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the player was and where they teleported to. Casting again will queue up multiple teleportations to occur in sequence.

Name: Vaal Lightning Warp
Description: Casts a delayed teleport for nearby enemies to a target destination. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the enemies both before and after they teleport.

Name: Summon Skeletons
Description: Summon Skeleton Warrior minions at the targeted location. They use a melee attack and die after a duration. If made aggressive, Skeleton Warriors will also dash towards nearby enemies.

Name: Summon Skeletons of Archers
Description: Summon Skeleton Archer minions at the targeted location. They fire arrows and die after a duration.

Name: Summon Skeletons of Mages
Description: Summon Skeleton Mage minions of random elemental types at the targeted location. They cast projectile spells based on their element, and die after a duration.

Name: Vaal Summon Skeletons
Description: Summons an army of skeletal soldiers, archers and mages, led by a powerful general.

Name: Heavy Strike
Description: Attacks enemies with a forceful blow. Requires a Mace, Sceptre, Axe, Sword or Staff.

Name: Dominating Blow
Description: Attacks enemies with a melee strike, applying a debuff for a short duration. If a non-unique enemy dies while affected by the debuff, the enemy's corpse will be consumed and a Sentinel of Dominance with the same rarity, prefix and suffix modifiers will be summoned for a longer secondary duration.

Name: Dominating Blow of Inspiring
Description: Attacks enemies with a melee strike, applying a debuff for a short duration. If a non-unique enemy dies while affected by the debuff, the enemy's corpse will be consumed and a Sentinel of Dominance with the same rarity, prefix and suffix modifiers will be summoned for a longer secondary duration.

Name: Vaal Domination
Description: This spell causes one of your existing Sentinels of Dominance to Ascend, becoming more powerful, gaining new attacks, and overriding its duration, while maintaining its monster modifiers and other bonuses, including from support gems. If you cannot have more Ascended Sentinels of Dominance, an existing one will be refreshed instead.

Name: Rain of Arrows
Description: Fires multiple arrows into the air, to land in sequence after a delay, starting at the targeted location and spreading outwards in all directions. Each arrow deals damage in an area around it. Half of the arrows will land directly on targets if there are targets in their range.

Name: Vaal Rain of Arrows
Description: Fires multiple arrows into the air, to land in multiple sequences after a delay, each starting at the targeted location and spreading outwards in all directions. Each arrow deals damage in an area around it. Half of the arrows will land directly on targets if there are targets in their range.

Name: Rain of Arrows of Artillery
Description: Fires multiple arrows into the air, to land in sequence after a delay, starting in front of you and proceeding in a line in the direction of the target. Each arrow deals damage in an area around it.

Name: Rain of Arrows of Saturation
Description: Fires multiple arrows into the air, to slowly land in sequence after a delay, starting at the targeted location and spreading outwards in all directions. Each arrow deals damage in an area around it. Half of the arrows will land directly on targets if there are targets in their range.

Name: Firestorm
Description: Flaming bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Name: Firestorm of Meteors
Description: A large flaming bolt falls towards the targeted area. The bolt explodes when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Name: Firestorm of Pelting
Description: Flaming bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Name: Vaal Firestorm
Description: A fixed number of flaming bolts rain down in a spiral, culminating in the central one impacting the targeted location. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies and leaving burning ground, which deals fire damage over time.

Name: Icestorm
Description: Icy bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies and chilling them, as well as causing patches of chilled ground. Skill damage is based on Intelligence.

Name: Lightning Strike
Description: Infuses your melee weapon with electrical energies as you swing. In addition to converting some of your physical damage to lightning damage, the stored energy is released from the weapon as projectiles as you strike, flying out to hit farther-away enemies. The projectiles cannot miss if the melee attack hit a target.

Name: Lightning Strike of Arcing
Description: Infuses your melee weapon with electrical energies as you swing. In addition to converting some of your physical damage to lightning damage, the stored energy is released from the weapon as a projectile as you strike, flying out to hit farther-away enemies and chain between them. The projectile cannot miss if the melee attack hit a target.

Name: Vaal Lightning Strike
Description: Infuses your melee weapon with electrical energies as you swing. In addition to converting some of your physical damage to lightning damage, the stored energy is forced into the enemy as you strike, electrically charging them for a duration, during which lightning will arc between them and other nearby enemies, dealing damage. This occurs even if the attack is dodged.

Name: Tempest Shield
Description: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them.

Name: Molten Shell
Description: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.

Name: Vaal Molten Shell
Description: Applies a buff that raises your armour, and takes some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. Each second, the skill deals reflected damage to surrounding enemies based on the damage taken by the buff in that second. When the buff is removed, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken by the buff. You cannot have the buff at the same time as any other Guard skill.

Name: Power Siphon
Description: Fires your wand to fire a single projectile each at a number of nearby enemies, granting you a power charge if an enemy is killed by, or soon after, the hit.

Name: Power Siphon of the Archmage
Description: Fires your wand to fire a single projectile each at a number of nearby enemies, granting you a power charge if an enemy is killed by, or soon after, the hit.

Name: Vaal Power Siphon
Description: Fires your wand simultaneously at all nearby enemies, culling those close to death and granting you a power charge for each. Cannot be supported by Volley.

Name: Puncture
Description: Punctures enemies, causing a bleeding debuff, which will be affected by modifiers to skill duration. Puncture works with bows, daggers, claws or swords.

Name: Puncture of Shanking
Description: Punctures enemies, causing a bleeding debuff, which will be affected by modifiers to skill duration. Puncture works with daggers, claws or swords.

Name: Lightning Arrow
Description: Fires a charged arrow which damages enemies by causing them to be struck by a bolt of lightning, which also damages a number of surrounding enemies.

Name: Lightning Arrow of Electrocution
Description: Fires a charged arrow which damages enemies by causing them to be struck by a bolt of lightning. It sticks into the final target, causing them to be struck and damaged multiple times.

Name: Vaal Lightning Arrow
Description: Fires charged arrows, which repeatedly travel for a short time before changing direction. When they hit enemies, they are struck by a bolt of lightning which damages a number of surrounding enemies.

Name: Haste
Description: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.

Name: Vaal Haste
Description: Casts a temporary aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.

Name: Purity of Elements
Description: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.

Name: Vitality
Description: Casts an aura that grants life regeneration to you and your allies.

Name: Discipline
Description: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.

Name: Vaal Discipline
Description: Casts a temporary aura that prevents energy shield recharge being delayed by damage taken for you and your allies.

Name: Precision
Description: Casts an aura that grants accuracy and critical strike chance to you and your allies.

Name: Grace
Description: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.

Name: Vaal Grace
Description: Casts a temporary aura that grants you and your allies additional chance to evade attacks, and makes suppressed spell damage unlucky against you.

Name: Determination
Description: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.

Name: Anger
Description: Casts an aura that adds fire damage to the attacks and spells of you and your allies.

Name: Hatred
Description: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.

Name: Wrath
Description: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.

Name: Burning Arrow
Description: Fires a burning arrow that deals fire damage and has a chance to ignite.

Name: Burning Arrow of Vigour
Description: Fires a burning arrow that deals fire damage and has a chance to ignite.

Name: Vaal Burning Arrow
Description: Fires an arrow that explodes, dealing fire damage to its target and other nearby enemies, with an increased chance of igniting them.

Name: Clarity
Description: Casts an aura that grants mana regeneration to you and your allies.

Name: Vaal Clarity
Description: Casts a temporary aura that lets you and your allies cast skills without paying their mana costs.

Name: Detonate Mines
Description: Detonates a Mine, starting a Detonation Sequence which will detonate other Mines around it.

Name: Shockwave Totem
Description: Summons a totem that shakes the earth around it, knocking back and damaging nearby enemies

Name: Rejuvenation Totem
Description: Summons a totem that has an aura which regenerates life for you and your nearby allies.

Name: Vaal Rejuvenation Totem
Description: Summons a totem that has an aura which regenerates life for you and your nearby allies. When things affected by the aura are hit, the totem's life is removed instead for some of the damage.

Name: Conversion Trap
Description: Throws a trap that, when triggered by an enemy, converts that enemy to your side for a short duration. Does not affect unique monsters or players.

Name: Bear Trap
Description: Throws a trap that damages and immobilises a single enemy for a duration based on how much damage was dealt. After the immobilise expires, a debuff remains on the enemy for a duration, lowering their movement speed by an amount which lessens over time. The affected enemy will take increased damage from traps and mines until the debuff expires. Modifiers to spell damage do not affect this skill's damage.

Name: Bear Trap of Skewers
Description: Throws a trap that damages and impales a single enemy, and immobilises them for a duration based on how much damage was dealt. Modifiers to spell damage do not affect this skill's damage.

Name: Freeze Mine
Description: Lays a remote mine that you can detonate to freeze all enemies in the area.

Name: Fire Trap
Description: Throws a trap that explodes when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies and leaving an area of burning ground that damages enemies who walk through it.

Name: Fire Trap of Blasting
Description: Throws a trap that explodes when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.

Name: Decoy Totem
Description: Summons a totem that taunts nearby monsters to attack it.

Name: Devouring Totem
Description: Summons a totem that can consume nearby corpses. If you are hurt, it will destroy a corpse to leech life to you.

Name: Ethereal Knives
Description: Fires an arc of knives in front of the caster which deals physical damage.

Name: Ethereal Knives of Lingering Blades
Description:
Fires an arc of knives down into the ground in front of the caster which deal physical damage.
Cannot be supported by Volley.

Name: Ethereal Knives of the Massacre
Description: Fires a circle of knives outwards around the caster which deal physical damage.

Name: Ice Shot
Description: Fires an arrow that converts some physical damage to cold on its target and converts all physical damage to cold in a cone behind that target.

Name: Ice Shot of Penetration
Description: Fires a piercing arrow that converts some physical damage to cold on its target and converts all physical damage to cold in two cones perpendicular to the target.

Name: Vaal Ice Shot
Description: Fires an arrow that converts some physical damage to cold on its target and converts all physical damage to cold in a cone behind that target. When you use this skill, it summons a squad of Mirage Sharpshooters for a duration. Cannot be used by Totems, Traps, or Mines.

Name: Creeping Frost
Description: Fire an icy projectile that bursts on impact or when reaching the targeted area, dealing area damage and creating a chilling area that deals cold damage over time. This area will creep across the ground towards nearby enemies until its duration expires.

Name: Arctic Armour
Description: Conjures an icy barrier that chills enemies when they hit you. You drop chilled ground while moving, and take less Fire and Physical damage while stationary.

Name: Holy Flame Totem
Description: Summons a totem that channels to fire a stream of flame at nearby enemies, and creates an area of consecrated ground around the totem.

Name: Flammability
Description: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their fire resistance and giving them a chance to be ignited when hit.

Name: Frostbite
Description: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their cold resistance and giving them a chance to be frozen when hit.

Name: Conductivity
Description: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their lightning resistance and giving them a chance to be shocked when hit.

Name: Ball Lightning
Description: Fires a slow-moving projectile that damages each enemy in an area around it repeatedly with bolts of lightning.

Name: Ball Lightning of Orbiting
Description: Fires a single projectile which moves in a spiral while damaging each enemy in an area around it repeatedly with bolts of lightning.

Name: Ball Lightning of Static
Description: Creates a ball of lightning at a location that damages each enemy in an area around it repeatedly with bolts of lightning. Cannot be supported by Spell Echo or used by Totems.

Name: Incinerate
Description: Continuously launches a torrent of fire from your hand, repeatedly damaging enemies. As you channel this spell longer, the flames spread wider close to you and spread longer directly in front of you. When you stop channelling you release a wave of fire damage over a wide and long area that will apply a powerful Ignite.

Name: Incinerate of Expanse
Description: Continuously launches a torrent of fire from your hand, repeatedly damaging enemies. As you channel this spell longer, the flames spread wider close to you and spread longer directly in front of you. When you stop channelling you release a slow-moving wave of fire damage over a very large area that will apply a powerful Ignite.

Name: Incinerate of Venting
Description: Continuously launches a torrent of fire from your hand, repeatedly damaging enemies. As you channel this spell longer, the flames spread wider close to you and spread longer directly in front of you.

Name: Cyclone
Description: Channel this skill to move towards a targeted location while spinning constantly attacking enemies in an area around you. While channelling this skill, you cannot be knocked back.

Name: Vaal Cyclone
Description: Spin and attack in place, damaging nearby enemies and pulling others towards you. While using this skill, you cannot be stunned or knocked back. Cannot be supported by Ruthless.

Name: Cyclone of Tumult
Description: Channel this skill to move towards a targeted location while spinning constantly attacking enemies in an area around you. While channelling this skill, you cannot be knocked back.

Name: Searing Bond
Description: Summons a totem that casts a beam of fire at you and each other totem you control, dealing burning damage to enemies caught in the beam. Enemies near either end of a beam also suffer burning damage.

Name: Reave
Description: Attacks an area in front of you. Each Reave that hits an enemy grants stages, which you will begin to lose after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.

Name: Reave of Refraction
Description: Attacks an area in front of you. Each Reave that hits an enemy grants stages, which you will begin to lose after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.

Name: Vaal Reave
Description: Repeatedly attacks a large area in different directions. Each Vaal Reave that hits an enemy grants stages, which you will begin to lose after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.

Name: Lightning Trap
Description: Throws a trap that launches a ring of projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets.

Name: Lightning Trap of Sparking
Description: Throws a trap that launches projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets.

Name: Vaal Lightning Trap
Description: Throws a trap that launches a ring of projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets and leaving a trail of shocked ground.

Name: Smoke Mine
Description: Throws a mine that will teleport you to it when detonated. It covers both your escape and arrival with a cloud of smoke that blinds enemies, and gives you a temporary buff to movement speed. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.

Name: Animate Guardian
Description: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. You cannot animate unidentified items. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.

Name: Animate Guardian of Smiting
Description: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side using Smite of Divine Judgement, ignoring weapon restrictions. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. You cannot animate unidentified items. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.

Name: Spectral Throw
Description: Throws a spectral copy of your melee weapon. It flies out and then returns to you, in a spinning attack that damages enemies in its path.

Name: Spectral Throw of Materialising
Description: Throws an intangible spectral copy of your melee weapon. It flies out and then becomes tangible as it returns to you, in a spinning attack that only hits and damages enemies while returning.

Name: Vaal Spectral Throw
Description: Throws a spectral copy of your melee weapon. It spirals out in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.

Name: Animate Weapon
Description: Animates a Melee Weapon Item or Lingering Blade to fight by your side. You cannot animate unidentified Weapons. Will not animate weapons with 6 sockets. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.

Name: Animate Weapon of Self Reflection
Description: Animates a copy of your main hand Melee Weapon to fight by your side. Cannot be used by Totems, Traps or Mines.

Name: Animate Weapon of Ranged Arms
Description: Animates a Ranged Weapon Item or Lingering Blade to fight by your side. You cannot animate unidentified Weapons. Will not animate weapons with 6 sockets. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.

Name: Vaal Animate Weapon
Description: Animates multiple Melee Weapon Items and Lingering Blades to fight by your side, and transforms them into different, unique weapons. You cannot animate unidentified Weapons. Will not animate weapons with 6 sockets. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.

Name: Purity of Fire
Description: Casts an aura that grants fire resistance to you and your allies.

Name: Purity of Ice
Description: Casts an aura that grants cold resistance to you and your allies.

Name: Purity of Lightning
Description: Casts an aura that grants lightning resistance to you and your allies.

Name: Storm Call
Description: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it and causing lightning strikes at any other markers you've cast.

Name: Vaal Storm Call
Description: Sets a marker at a location. Lightning strikes random enemies around the marker repeatedly over the skill's duration, dealing damage in an area around the strike. Modifiers to the skill's duration will also affect the delay between these strikes. When the duration ends, a large bolt of lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it.

Name: Storm of Judgement
Description: Creates a number of markers around the targeted location, which will explode after a duration, dealing lightning damage. Cannot be supported by Spell Cascade.

Name: Flameblast
Description: Channels to build up a large explosion, which is released when you stop using the skill. The longer you channel, the larger the area of effect and damage of the explosion.

Name: Flameblast of Celerity
Description: Channels to build up an explosion, which is released when you stop using the skill or automatically at maximum stages. The longer you channel, the larger the area of effect and damage of the explosion.

Name: Flameblast of Contraction
Description: Channels to concentrate an explosion, which is released when you stop using the skill. The longer you channel, the larger the damage of the explosion, but the smaller the area.

Name: Blood Sacrament
Description: Channel this skill to reserve more and more of your life, building up power in a marker on the ground under you. Release to deal physical damage in an area based on how much life you reserved. Cannot be cast by Totems.

Name: Vaal Flameblast
Description: Targets an area and builds up a large explosion. The build-up speed is based on cast speed. The explosion occurs after it reaches 10 stacks.

Name: Flames of Judgement
Description: Creates markers at your location and a targeted location, which grow over time based on cast speed, then explode, dealing fire damage. Cannot be supported by Spell Cascade.

Name: Barrage
Description: After a short preparation time, you fire individual projectiles repeatedly with a Bow or Wand. These projectiles have a small randomised spread. This skill cannot be Triggered.

Name: Barrage of Volley Fire
Description: After a short preparation time, you fire projectiles repeatedly with a Bow or Wand. These projectiles have a small randomised spread. This skill cannot be Triggered.

Name: Summon Raging Spirit
Description: Summons a short-lived flaming skull that rushes at nearby enemies and attacks them rapidly, converting all its physical damage to fire. Enemies will not directly engage these spirits, and can pass through them.

Name: Summon Raging Spirit of Enormity
Description: Summons a short-lived flaming skull that rushes at nearby enemies and attacks them rapidly, converting all its physical damage to fire. Enemies will not directly engage these spirits, and can pass through them.

Name: Flame Surge
Description: Strikes enemies in front of you with a surge of flame. Burning enemies are dealt more damage. If you hit an ignited enemy, will create burning ground under them. Your damage modifiers don't apply to this burning ground.

Name: Flame Surge of Combusting
Description: Strikes enemies in front of you with a surge of flame. If this ignites an enemy a large area of burning ground will be created under them. Your damage modifiers don't apply to this burning ground.

Name: Desecrate
Description: Desecrates the ground, spawning corpses based on monsters in the current area and dealing chaos damage over time to enemies. If you are using the Raise Spectre skill there is a chance to spawn spectral corpses matching your most recently raised Spectres. Spectral corpses cannot be interacted with except by Minion skills.

Name: Flesh Offering
Description: Consumes a corpse, which temporarily empowers your minions with swiftness. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.

Name: Bone Offering
Description: Consumes a corpse, granting all of your minions the power to block both attacks and spells. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.

Name: Glacial Cascade
Description: Icicles emerge from the ground in a series of small bursts, each damaging enemies caught in the area and knocking them back in the direction of the next burst.

Name: Storm Cascade
Description: Lightning crackles in a series of small bursts, each damaging enemies caught in the area.

Name: Molten Strike
Description: Infuses your melee weapon with molten energies to attack with physical and fire damage. This attack causes balls of molten magma to launch forth from the enemies you hit, divided amongst all enemies hit by the strike. These will deal area attack damage to enemies where they land.

Name: Molten Strike of the Zenith
Description: Infuses your two-handed melee weapon with molten energies to attack with physical and fire damage. This attack causes balls of molten magma to launch forth from the enemies you hit, divided amongst all enemies hit by the strike. These will deal area attack damage to enemies where they land. Every fifth time you attack with this skill it fires more, high-damage projectiles.

Name: Vaal Molten Strike
Description: Infuses your melee weapon with molten energies to attack with physical and fire damage. This attack causes balls of molten magma to launch forth causing area attack damage to enemies where they land.

Name: Convocation
Description: Recalls all minions that are following you to your location, and grants them a temporary life regeneration effect.

Name: Tornado Shot
Description: Fires a piercing shot that travels until it reaches the targeted location. It will then fire projectiles out in all directions from that point, which will travel for a short time before disappearing.

Name: Tornado Shot of Cloudburst
Description: Fires a single payload arrow into the air to land at a targeted location. It will then fire arrows out in all directions from that point.

Name: Illusory Warp
Description: Teleport to a target destination. Chilled ground is spread in an area around both where the caster was and where they teleported to.

Name: Herald of Ash
Description: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).

Name: Herald of Ice
Description: Grants a buff adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, this skill will cause them to explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them. This damage is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

Name: Herald of Thunder
Description: Grants a buff which adds lightning damage to spells and attacks. If you kill a shocked enemy, this skill will create a storm, causing lightning bolts to strike enemies around you for a duration. The damage inflicted by this skill is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

Name: Herald of Agony
Description: Grants a buff giving more poison damage and a chance to inflict poison. When you poison an enemy while you have this buff, you gain Virulence, and summon an Agony Crawler minion that uses projectile and area attacks. You will lose Virulence over time, at a rate which increases the more Virulence you have. The minion will die when you have no Virulence.

Name: Herald of Purity
Description: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. When you kill an enemy while you have this buff, this skill will summon a Sentinel of Purity, or refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them. The Sentinels of Purity have a single-target melee attack and an area melee attack.

Name: Consecrate
Description: Creates an area of Consecrated Ground, providing life regeneration and reducing the effect of curses for you and allies who stand in it.

Name: Poacher's Mark
Description: Curses a single enemy, lowering their physical damage reduction, and adding physical damage to all hits against them. Attacking the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and killing them will grant a frenzy charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.

Name: Lightning Tendrils
Description: While you channel this skill, it releases pulses of electrical energy, dealing lightning damage in a semicircular area in front of you.

Name: Lightning Tendrils of Eccentricity
Description: While you channel this skill, it releases pulses of electrical energy, dealing lightning damage in a semicircular area in front of you.

Name: Lightning Tendrils of Escalation
Description: While you channel this skill, it releases pulses of electrical energy, dealing lightning damage in a growing semicircular area in front of you.

Name: Word of Winter
Description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.

Name: Edict of Winter
Description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.

Name: Decree of Winter
Description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.

Name: Commandment of Winter
Description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.

Name: Kinetic Blast
Description: Fires a projectile from a Wand that causes a series of area explosions in a secondary radius around its point of impact, each damaging enemies.

Name: Kinetic Blast of Clustering
Description: Fires a projectile from a Wand that causes a series of area explosions in a secondary radius around its point of impact, each damaging enemies.

Name: Blink Arrow
Description: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, you are teleported to it and a clone is summoned at your old location. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver.

Name: Blink Arrow of Bombarding Clones
Description: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, you are teleported to it and a clone is summoned at your old location. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver to fire arrows into the air to land around a target.

Name: Blink Arrow of Prismatic Clones
Description: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, you are teleported to it and a clone is summoned at your old location. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver to fire random elemental arrows which convert all physical damage to the chosen element and deal no damage of other damage types.

Name: Mirror Arrow
Description: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, a clone is summoned. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver.

Name: Mirror Arrow of Bombarding Clones
Description: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, a clone is summoned. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver to fire arrows into the air to land around a target.

Name: Mirror Arrow of Prismatic Clones
Description: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, a clone is summoned. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver to fire random elemental arrows which convert all physical damage to the chosen element and deal no damage of other damage types.

Name: Riposte
Description: Perform a deadly counter-attack when you block. Uses both weapons while you're dual wielding.

Name: Reckoning
Description: Perform a swift counter-attack against enemies in a cone shape when you block with your shield.

Name: Static Strike
Description: Attack with a melee weapon, gaining static energy for a duration if you hit an enemy. While you have static energy, you'll frequently hit a number of nearby enemies with beams, dealing attack damage.

Name: Word of the Tempest
Description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.

Name: Edict of the Tempest
Description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.

Name: Decree of the Tempest
Description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.

Name: Commandment of the Tempest
Description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.

Name: Vengeance
Description: Chance to perform a swift counter-attack against all enemies around you when you are hit. Weapon range increases the area of this attack. Requires a Melee Weapon.

Name: Summon Chaos Golem
Description: Summons a Chaos Golem that grants you Physical Damage Reduction. The Chaos Golem can cast a damage over time Chaos aura and a cascade of Chaos spikes in addition to its melee attack.

Name: Summon Chaos Golem of Hordes
Description: Summons a Chaos Golem. The Chaos Golem can cast a damage over time Chaos aura and a cascade of Chaos spikes in addition to its melee attack.

Name: Summon Chaos Golem of the Maelström
Description: Summons a Chaos Golem. The Chaos Golem can cast a powerful damage over time Chaos aura that Withers enemies in addition to its melee attack.

Name: Summon Ice Golem
Description: Summons an Ice Golem that grants you increased Critical Strike Chance and Accuracy. The Ice Golem can use an icy barrage spell and a chilling spinning attack in addition to its melee attack.

Name: Summon Ice Golem of Hordes
Description: Summons an Ice Golem. The Ice Golem can use an icy barrage spell and a chilling spinning attack in addition to its melee attack.

Name: Summon Ice Golem of Shattering
Description: Summons an Ice Golem. The Ice Golem can use an icy barrage spell and a chilling spinning attack in addition to its melee attack. If reduced to low life it will trigger a spell that destroys itself to deal area damage and fire icy projectiles in a circle.

Name: Summon Flame Golem
Description: Summons a Flame Golem that grants you increased Damage. The Flame Golem can cast a fire spray, a wave of fire damage, and an explosive arcing projectile.

Name: Summon Flame Golem of Hordes
Description: Summons a Flame Golem. The Flame Golem can cast a fire spray, a wave of fire damage, and an explosive arcing projectile.

Name: Summon Flame Golem of the Meteor
Description: Summons a Flame Golem. When summoned, the Flame Golem attacks by falling from the sky, dealing fire damage in an area and leaving burning ground around the impact. After landing, it can cast a fire spray and a wave of fire damage.

Name: Ice Crash
Description: Slam the ground, damaging enemies in an area around the impact in three stages of increasing size. Enemies take slightly less damage on the second and third stage, and can only be hit by one stage. Works with Swords, Maces, Sceptres, Axes, Staves and Unarmed.

Name: Ice Crash of Cadence
Description: Slam the ground, damaging enemies in an area. Slams with main hand weapon deal more damage. Slams with off hand weapon have larger area of effect. Requires dual-wielding Swords, Maces, Sceptres, or Axes to use.

Name: Flame Dash
Description: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.

Name: Flame Dash of Incinerating
Description: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving an intense trail of burning ground. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.

Name: Flame Dash of Return
Description: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground, then repeat the teleport in the other direction. Cannot be triggered, or used by a totem, trap or mine. Cannot be supported by Unleash.

Name: Gluttony of Elements
Description: Casts an aura that causes taking elemental damage to heal you and nearby allies instead.

Name: Vigilant Strike
Description: Attacks enemies with a powerful melee strike which grants Fortification, reducing damage you take from hits. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending an Endurance Charge. Requires a Melee Weapon.

Name: Frost Blades
Description: Attack enemies with increased range, releasing icy blades from the first enemy hit which fly at other enemies. Requires a Melee Weapon.

Name: Frost Blades of Katabasis
Description: Attack enemies with greatly increased range, creating a chilling area that deals cold damage over time if it hits. Requires a Melee Weapon.

Name: Rolling Magma
Description: Lob a fiery orb that deals area damage as it hits the ground. The skill chains, bouncing forward to deal damage multiple times.

Name: Punishment
Description: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to be debilitated when they hit enemies and increasing damage they take while on low life.

Name: Vaal Arctic Armour
Description: Immediately encases you in ice, protecting you for a duration or until you take damage from a number of hits, and also grants a buff once the cast time has finished. You cannot move or perform non-instant actions while in the ice. When the ice breaks, the buff is also removed.

Name: Wild Strike
Description: Your melee weapon strikes enemies, converting physical damage to a random element. Then, depending on the element chosen, it releases a fiery explosion, an arcing bolt of lightning, or an icy wave. It will avoid choosing the same element twice in a row.

Name: Wild Strike of Extremes
Description: Your melee weapon strikes enemies, converting physical damage to a random element. Then, depending on the element chosen, it releases a fiery explosion, an arcing bolt of lightning, or an icy wave. It will avoid choosing the same element twice in a row.

Name: Ice Trap
Description: Throws a trap that creates a series of icy runic explosions when triggered, dealing cold damage to all enemies caught in the blasts.

Name: Ice Trap of Hollowness
Description: Throws a trap that creates a series of icy runic explosions in a circle around itself when triggered, dealing cold damage to all enemies caught in the blasts.

Name: Blast Rain
Description: Fires arrows up in the air, to rain down in an area. Each arrow deals area damage around where it lands, and they will all overlap on the targeted location.

Name: Galvanic Arrow
Description: Fire a trio of electrical arrows that quickly dissipate, vanishing shortly after being loosed. The arrows are fired with such force that they create a burst of lightning, damaging enemies in a cone in front of you.

Name: Galvanic Arrow of Energy
Description: Create a burst of lightning from your Bow, firing no arrows but damaging enemies in a cone in front of you.

Name: Galvanic Arrow of Surging
Description: Fire a trio of electrical arrows that quickly dissipate, vanishing shortly after being loosed. If the arrows' flight is stopped by colliding with a target, they create a burst of lightning, damaging enemies in a cone behind the target

Name: Bladefall
Description: Ethereal weapons rain from the sky, dealing damage to enemies in a sequence of volleys. Enemies can be hit multiple times where these overlap.

Name: Bladefall of Volleys
Description: Ethereal weapons rain from the sky, dealing damage to enemies in a sequence of volleys, each wider and more damaging than the last. Enemies can be hit multiple times where these overlap.

Name: Bladefall of Impaling
Description: Ethereal weapons rain from the sky, dealing damage to enemies in a sequence of volleys. Enemies can be hit multiple times where these overlap.

Name: Blade Vortex
Description: This spell creates ethereal blades which orbit in an area around you, dealing damage every 0.6 seconds to all enemies in their radius. As more blades are added, the damage becomes greater and more frequent.

Name: Vaal Blade Vortex
Description: Creates an independently-moving vortex of ethereal blades which lasts for a duration. The vortex moves toward nearby enemies, repeatedly damaging enemies that it passes through.

Name: Frost Bomb
Description: Creates a crystal that pulses with cold for a duration. Each pulse applies a debuff to nearby enemies for a secondary duration which reduces life regeneration rate, and also inflicts Cold Exposure. When the crystal's duration ends, it explodes, dealing heavy cold damage to enemies around it.

Name: Frost Bomb of Instability
Description: Creates a crystal which lasts for a duration. When the crystal's duration ends, it explodes, dealing cold damage to enemies around it.

Name: Frost Bomb of Forthcoming
Description: Creates a crystal which lasts for a duration. When the crystal's duration ends, it explodes, dealing heavy cold damage to enemies around it.

Name: Word of Flames
Description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.

Name: Edict of Flames
Description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.

Name: Decree of Flames
Description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.

Name: Commandment of Flames
Description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.

Name: Manifest Dancing Dervishes
Description: Manifests two Dancing Dervishes to fight by your side. While a Dancing Dervish is manifested, you have Onslaught and cannot use Weapons. Cannot be supported by supports that would create other minions.

Name: Orb of Storms
Description: Creates a stationary electrical orb that strikes enemies in its area of effect with beams of lightning that can then split to hit more enemies. Modifiers to cast speed will increase how frequently it does this. Casting this skill again will replace the previous orb.

Name: Word of the Grave
Description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.

Name: Edict of the Grave
Description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.

Name: Decree of the Grave
Description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.

Name: Commandment of the Grave
Description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.

Name: Word of Reflection
Description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.

Name: Edict of Reflection
Description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.

Name: Decree of Reflection
Description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.

Name: Commandment of Reflection
Description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.

Name: Word of Light
Description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.

Name: Edict of Light
Description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.

Name: Decree of Light
Description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.

Name: Commandment of Light
Description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.

Name: Word of Thunder
Description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.

Name: Edict of Thunder
Description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.

Name: Decree of Thunder
Description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.

Name: Commandment of Thunder
Description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.

Name: Summon Stone Golem
Description: Summons a Stone Golem that grants you life regeneration. In addition to its melee attack, the Stone Golem uses a rolling charge and a powerful slam that can taunt enemies.

Name: Summon Stone Golem of Hordes
Description: Summons a Stone Golem. In addition to its melee attack, the Stone Golem uses a rolling charge and a powerful slam that can taunt enemies.

Name: Summon Stone Golem of Safeguarding
Description: Summons a Stone Golem that takes a portion of the melee damage you recieve from enemy hits from its life before yours. In addition to its melee attack, the Stone Golem uses a rolling charge and a powerful slam that can taunt enemies.

Name: Word of Force
Description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.

Name: Edict of Force
Description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.

Name: Decree of Force
Description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.

Name: Commandment of Force
Description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.

Name: Word of War
Description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.

Name: Edict of War
Description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.

Name: Decree of War
Description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.

Name: Commandment of War
Description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.

Name: Earthquake
Description: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration. Cracks created before the first one has erupted will not generate their own aftershocks. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

Name: Earthquake of Amplification
Description: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration. Cracks created before the first one has erupted will not generate their own aftershocks. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

Name: Vaal Earthquake
Description: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a short duration. After using this skill, your steps will deal damage around you, cracking the earth if the previous cracks have erupted. This effect ends after a secondary duration, or after a maximum number of aftershocks. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

Name: Contagion
Description: Unleashes a vile contagion on enemies, dealing chaos damage over time. If an enemy dies while affected by Contagion, the debuff spreads to other enemies.

Name: Contagion of Subsiding
Description: Unleashes a vile contagion on enemies, dealing chaos damage over time. If an enemy dies while affected by Contagion, the debuff spreads to other enemies, but each time it spreads, it only deals three quarters as much damage as before.

Name: Contagion of Transference
Description: Unleashes a vile contagion on enemies, dealing chaos damage over time. If an enemy is hit while affected by Contagion, the debuff spreads to other enemies.

Name: Wither
Description: Casts a debilitating debuff on enemies in an area, hindering their movement and also inflicts the Withered debuff, which increases the Chaos Damage they take and can stack up to 15 times.

Name: Essence Drain
Description: Fires a projectile that applies a damage over time debuff when it hits. You are healed for a portion of the debuff damage. The debuff is spread by Contagion.

Name: Essence Drain of Desperation
Description: Fires a projectile that applies a damage over time debuff when it hits. You lose Life and Energy Shield equal to a portion of the debuff damage. The debuff is spread by Contagion.

Name: Essence Drain of Wickedness
Description: Fires a piercing projectile that applies a damage over time debuff when it hits. You are healed for a portion of the debuff damage.

Name: Word of Inferno
Description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.

Name: Edict of Inferno
Description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.

Name: Decree of Inferno
Description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.

Name: Commandment of Inferno
Description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.

Name: Word of Frost
Description: Fire icy projectiles around you in all directions.

Name: Edict of Frost
Description: Fire icy projectiles around you in all directions.

Name: Decree of Frost
Description: Fire icy projectiles around you in all directions.

Name: Commandment of Frost
Description: Fire icy projectiles around you in all directions.

Name: Word of Blades
Description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.

Name: Edict of Blades
Description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.

Name: Decree of Blades
Description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.

Name: Commandment of Blades
Description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.

Name: Word of Spite
Description: Releases a circle of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilled ground in their wake.

Name: Edict of Spite
Description: Releases a circle of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilled ground in their wake.

Name: Decree of Spite
Description: Releases a circle of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilled ground in their wake.

Name: Commandment of Spite
Description: Releases a circle of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilled ground in their wake.

Name: Word of Fury
Description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.

Name: Edict of Fury
Description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.

Name: Decree of Fury
Description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.

Name: Commandment of Fury
Description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.

Name: Siege Ballista
Description: Summons a ballista totem that attacks with piercing arrows. Requires a Bow.

Name: Siege Ballista of Splintering
Description:
Summons a ballista totem that attacks with forking arrows.
Requires a Bow.

Name: Ancestral Protector
Description: Summons an Ancestor Totem which attacks enemies with melee strikes while you're near it. Being near it grants you more attack speed. Requires a Melee Weapon or Unarmed.

Name: Fire Burst
Description: A burst of flame errupts from the location of a hit, dealing fire damage.

Name: Sunder
Description: Slams the ground, creating a slow wave of churning terrain that damages enemies in a sequence of areas in front of you. A number of enemies hit by the wave will release a shockwave, damaging other enemies around them. Using the skill again will stop the previous wave. Requires a Mace, Sceptre, Axe, Staff or Unarmed.

Name: Sunder of Earthbreaking
Description: Slams the ground, creating a wave of churning terrain that damages enemies in a sequence of areas in front of you. A number of enemies hit by the wave will release a shockwave, damaging other enemies around them. Requires a Mace, Sceptre, Axe, Staff or Unarmed.

Name: Summon Spectral Wolf
Description: Summons a spectral wolf companion that attacks nearby enemies and dies after a duration. Each spectral wolf grants you a buff that adds damage to your attacks. If you have the maximum number of them, refreshes the duration and life of an existing one instead.

Name: Shock Ground
Description: Creates a patch of Shocked Ground.

Name: Frostbolt
Description: Fires a slow-moving projectile that pierces through enemies, dealing cold damage.

Name: Vortex
Description: An icy blast explodes around the caster, dealing cold damage to enemies, and leaving behind a whirling vortex which deals cold damage over time and chills enemies caught in it.

Name: Vortex of Projection
Description: An icy blast explodes around the caster, dealing cold damage to enemies, and leaving behind a whirling vortex which deals cold damage over time and chills enemies caught in it. If the caster targets near their Frostbolt projectiles, it will explode from a number of those projectiles instead, destroying them.

Name: Blight
Description: Apply a debuff to enemies in front of you which deals chaos damage over time. Enemies who aren't already debuffed by Blight are also hindered for a shorter secondary duration, slowing their movement. Continued channelling adds layers of damage to the debuff, each with their own duration.

Name: Blight of Contagion
Description: Apply a debuff to enemies in front of you which deals chaos damage over time. Enemies who aren't already debuffed by Blight are also hindered for a shorter secondary duration, slowing their movement. Continued channelling adds layers of damage to the debuff, each with their own duration. The damaging debuff is spread by Contagion.

Name: Blight of Atrophy
Description: Apply a debuff to enemies in front of you which deals chaos damage over time. Enemies who aren't already debuffed by Blight are also hindered for a longer secondary duration, slowing their movement and reducing their life regeneration rate. Continued channelling adds layers of damage to the debuff, each with their own duration.

Name: Vaal Blight
Description: Apply a powerful debuff to enemies around you which deals chaos damage over time. Then applies two additional layers in a larger area, growing greatly in size each time. Enemies are also substantially hindered for a shorter secondary duration, slowing their movement.

Name: Molten Burst
Description: Launch molten projectiles from the point of impact, causing AoE attack damage to enemies where they land.

Name: Word of Ire
Description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.

Name: Edict of Ire
Description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.

Name: Decree of Ire
Description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.

Name: Commandment of Ire
Description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.

Name: Blade Flurry
Description: Repeatedly hit enemies in a circle in front of you while channelling, dealing damage to and around the enemy. The damage is continually boosted while channelling. You unleash an additional hit for each stage reached once the channelling ends. Requires a Dagger, Claw or One-Handed Sword.

Name: Blade Flurry of Incision
Description: Repeatedly hit enemies in a circle in front of you while channelling, dealing damage to and around the enemy. The critical strike chance is continually boosted while channelling. You unleash an additional hit for each stage reached once the channelling ends. Requires a Dagger, Claw or One-Handed Sword.

Name: Vaal Blade Flurry
Description: Channel to create an expanding circle area around you that blinds enemies within it. When you stop channelling, deals damage in a smaller area around each enemy in the circle. Requires a Dagger, Claw or One-Handed Sword.

Name: Abberath's Fury
Description: While you run, this skill creates a small explosion with each step, dealing fire damage in an area around you.

Name: Spirit Offering
Description: Consumes a corpse, granting increased critical strike chance and additional critical strike multiplier to your minions. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.

Name: Summon Lightning Golem
Description: Summons a Lightning Golem that grants you increased Attack and Cast speed. The Lightning Golem fires a projectile spell, creates orbs of Lightning that zap nearby enemies, and casts a temporary aura that grants added Lightning Damage to spells and attacks used by the Golem and its nearby allies.

Name: Summon Lightning Golem of Hordes
Description: Summons a Lightning Golem. The Lightning Golem fires a projectile spell, creates orbs of Lightning that zap nearby enemies, and casts a temporary aura that grants added Lightning Damage to spells and attacks used by the Golem and its nearby allies.

Name: Ancestral Warchief
Description: Summons an Ancestor Totem which attacks enemies with a powerful slam while you're near it. Being near it grants you more melee damage. Requires a Melee Weapon or Unarmed.

Name: Vaal Ancestral Warchief
Description: Summons an Ancestor Totem which attacks enemies with a powerful cascading slam while you're near it. If the enemies are far away, it will leap toward them as it slams. Being near it grants you more melee damage. Requires a Melee Weapon or Unarmed.

Name: Lacerate
Description: Slashes twice, releasing waves of force that damage enemies they hit. Enemies in the middle of the slashes can be hit by both. The slashes will have a chance to inflict bleeding in Blood Stance, or have a wider angle in Sand Stance. Can be used with Axes and Swords. You are in Blood Stance by default.

Name: Lacerate of Butchering
Description: Slashes twice, releasing wide waves of force that damage enemies they hit. Enemies in the middle of the slashes can be hit by both. Requires a Two Handed Axe or Two Handed Sword.

Name: Lacerate of Haemorrhage
Description: Slashes twice, releasing waves of force that damage enemies they hit. Enemies in the middle of the slashes can be hit by both. Requires a One Handed Axe or One Handed Sword.

Name: Dark Pact
Description: This spell removes some life from one of your Skeleton minions near you or the targeted location to deal chaos damage in an area around it. This effect will chain to your other nearby skeletons. If you have no skeletons near you or the targeted location, it will sacrifice your own life to deal damage instead.

Name: Elemental Warding
Description: Fires projectiles in all directions, converting all their physical damage to a random element, and grants a buff which makes you unaffected by curses for a duration. Removes curses on you when used.

Name: Scorching Ray
Description: Unleash a beam of fire that burns enemies it touches. Remaining in the beam raises the burning, adding a portion of the beam's damage in stages. Inflicts Fire Exposure at maximum stages. Enemies who leave the beam continue to burn for a duration. Increasing cast speed also increases the rate at which the beam turns.

Name: Scorching Ray of Immolation
Description: Unleash a beam of fire that burns enemies it touches. Remaining in the beam raises the burning, adding a portion of the beam's damage in stages. Enemies who leave the beam continue to burn for a duration. Increasing cast speed also increases the rate at which the beam turns.

Name: Spectral Spirits
Description: Summons three invulnerable spectral skulls that rush at nearby enemies and attack them rapidly. Enemies will not engage these spirits, and can pass through them.

Name: Blade Vortex of the Scythe
Description: This spell creates a swarm of ethereal blades which briefly orbit in an area around you, dealing damage every 0.6 seconds to all enemies in their radius.

Name: Spectral Shield Throw
Description: Throws a spectral copy of your shield as a projectile which cannot pierce, and deals off-hand damage augmented by the defences of the shield. When it collides with something it will shatter, launching a number of smaller shards as projectiles in all directions. Modifiers that cause additional projectiles to be fired will add more shards, not more copies of the shield.

Name: Spectral Shield Throw of Shattering
Description: Throws a spectral copy of your shield as a projectile which cannot pierce, and deals off-hand damage augmented by the evasion of the shield. When it collides with something it will shatter, launching a number of smaller shards as projectiles in all directions. Modifiers that cause additional projectiles to be fired will add more shards, not more copies of the shield.

Name: Envy
Description: Casts an aura that adds chaos damage to the attacks and spells of you and your allies.

Name: Bone Nova
